sentences.english: Pegmatites seem to form during a late magmatic stage.
sentences.chinese: 偉晶岩似乎是在較晚的岩漿階段形成的。

sentences.english: Aquamarine occurs in rare metal-bearing granite-bearing granite-pegmatitesof northeastern Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 湘東北海藍寶石產於含稀有金屬花崗偉晶岩中。

sentences.english: The deposits occur in the old shield which is rich in dark rocks and pegmatites.
sentences.chinese: 它們產於富含暗色巖和偉晶岩的古老地盾區內。

sentences.english: The granite-pegmatite-type uranium deposit is a new type of uranium deposit which has been recently discovered.
sentences.chinese: 花崗偉晶岩型鈾礦是目前發現的一種新類型鈾礦。
